document.title: COLLEGE AND CAREER READY STANDARDS Indiana Academic Standards World Languages Heritage Language Learners 2019

9356CAFBA27E4073A1803CDA186EFF09.description:
Advanced: I can engage within my heritage and major communities to identify specific
strategies and goals that consider the multiple contributions of my school, home, and community.

55FAB69167AD4371B977B6FC0D385407.description:
Intermediate: I can connect with my family’s experiences and my heritage community to identify
ways to be engaged within the greater school and community.

832FB2367FFC46AC98444B1BB33CA137.description:
I can connect with my heritage to identify relationships between my heritage family
and school.

A2553F5C1E9F4527980FB2BCF7677FFB.description:
Lifelong Learning - Learners reflect on their progress in using languages for
enjoyment, enrichment, and advancement.

E0C1C19BDB52472282DA5979C5E448EA.description:
Advanced: I can embody my heritage experiences, including my linguistic,
cultural, and racial identities, while deeply engaging and advocating across multiple social
contexts including schools, home, and community.

C70FF60300634382A9EA12EA5091CC0E.description: Intermediate: I can connect my experiences, including my heritage identity and language, while interacting within my school, home and community.

FAC22B2CC5BE4767B686B2DA7C3F3088.description:
Novice: I can connect my experiences, including my heritage identity and
language, while interacting within my school and home.

5FB10BD983E04D539561AA387C94D5E5.description:
School and Global - Learners use the language both within and beyond the
classroom to interact and collaborate in their community and the globalized world.

336F63D776614B4BB4B3921F22F545BF.description:
Communicate and interact with cultural competence in order to participate in
multilingual communities at home and around the world.

B6027015EB3A442E9F82B637DF097D3F.description:
Advanced: I can examine and analyze national and regional language variation
within the heritage language.

D6A90955F21F41FB87890AF17CC5830B.description:
Advanced: I can use my heritage language to investigate, explain, and reflect on
the nature of language on my own.

D833E5CA63474E49AD30379175C2556B.description:
Intermediate: I can describe national and regional language variation within the
heritage language.

AF9893B5E954470C857BFF05FAF6A9A4.description:
Intermediate: I can use my heritage language to investigate, explain, and reflect
on the nature of language with minimal guidance.

BAA4B0E60918492BA78E247AE654EE5A.description:
Novice: I can recognize national and regional language variation within the
heritage language.

CF27544AED2A4FF6984C08B9323E32ED.description:
Novice: I can use my heritage language to identify, describe, and discuss the
nature of language, with guidance.

0E33419BEDBE4EBEA180873196F958D8.description:
Language Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the nature of language through comparisons of the language studied and their own.

3BD024BE770D4BDD8C49AFAB4DDDA18C.description:
Advanced: I can explain, provide details about, and give specific examples of
differences and similarities between my community and cultures of the language that I use.

7A5BE4D37A144FB196736612A857FFBE.description: Intermediate: I can explain and provide generic details about differences and similarities between my community and cultures of the target language.

CE6E7BEE5AAE49A3B63DDB1598B33C30.description:
Novice: I can identify differences and similarities between my community and
cultures of the target language.

B04A02D5C41B44619730AD5164CAF634.description:
Cultural Comparisons - Learners use the language to investigate, explain, and
reflect on the concept of culture through comparisons of the cultures studied with their own.

AE0FF3FD844D45C494161E361C711A6C.description:
Develop insight into the nature of language and culture in order to interact with
cultural competence.

603AB0AD467D48EF8B52B4026FC50BB9.description:
Advanced: I can appropriate my heritage language, culture, and experiences
across multiple social and academic contexts.

E2441DD83CDE4CF49CA85568FB0DD0F9.description: Intermediate: I can appropriate my heritag

2EF9E165582E4E97AB007415E68779E4.description:
Novice: I can use my heritage language, culture, and experiences across some
social and academic contexts.

0E36A477B8184BBFA31643BB991C4EC4.description:
Making Connections - Learners build, reinforce, and expand their knowledge of
other disciplines while using the target language to develop critical thinking and to solve problems
creatively.

889FF42E08E54A8AB2700EC6484335E6.description:
Advanced: I can solicit diverse perspectives of the heritage language and culture
to ensure its inclusion of multiple perspectives.

8BB23889352B47C5BA67B173E1DFC2BD.description:
Advanced: I can critique primary resources of the heritage language and culture
and discern its inclusion of diverse perspectives.

56B623505783433B9BFAAED5FD13C6CC.description:
Intermediate: I can gather primary resources of the heritage language and culture
and identify the perspective of the resource.

66E388BE9E9943588F4192205243DC5E.description: Novice: I can gather primary resources of the heritage language and culture and connect to my heritage language and culture.

1A719478021C4BE4AA5EAAF9C33D1FB2.description:
Acquiring Information and Diverse Perspectives - Learners access and
evaluate information and diverse perspectives that are available through language and its cultures.

39638087594348E78D2DAEED4CCD958A.description:
Connect with other disciplines and acquire information and diverse perspectives in
order to use the language to function academic and career-related situations.

F91DA9EAD0B74B93B1941A30D3B44BD4.description:
I can analyze historical and contemporary phenomena of my heritage language
and culture with my peers, school community, heritage community, and family to advocate for
positive language and cultural identity development.

F63283259F39475D92ED29D24D4D9404.description:
I can analyze the different historical and contemporary heritage backgrounds
among my heritage classmates.

404EAA9E19094B00B3ADE6D71BC02176.description:
I can research, discuss, and analyze significant historical phenomena that are
unique to my heritage culture.

827CD3889D894AF38CC24763C62A7E7A.description:
I can research, discuss, and analyze contemporary experiences that are unique to
my heritage culture.

CEF3C3D1BEE24959BC761820ABFAC48D.description:
I can discuss and analyze the different traditions in comparison with my own
heritage experiences.

4213BC23A6D54DD9805FD9D2B6F08543.description:
I can discuss and analyze the perspectives of different traditions within families,
communities, and schools.

11AA7FE56AFD43418FB639BEEAF287CE.description:
I can reflect on the diversity among products and practices and how they relate to
perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

E8624E741C934AAF83A0FF2E30E67F27.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Advanced - I can reflect on the diversity among products and practices and
how they relate to perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

E6031A4BC17C49409ACD6F886E5622FE.description:
I can discuss and examine historical and contemporary phenomena of my heritage
language and culture with my peers, school community, heritage community, and family.

DC50221D75BD47ABB2C882D513D51AE7.description:
I can discuss the different historical and contemporary heritage backgrounds among
my heritage classmates.

75647E83F05C47BDA5A3FBC743B67EFB.description:
I can research and examine significant historical phenomena that are unique to my
heritage culture.

85E1C1B669ED4ADE8ED9A78ECD0529DE.description:
I can research and examine contemporary experiences that are unique to my
heritage culture.

BC0404BACC8B473590F781505CB81722.description:
I can describe and discuss the different traditions in comparison with my own
heritage experiences.

486AE11C9CFA4A6C9269A6181DEF1392.description:
I can describe and discuss the perspectives of different traditions within families,
communities, and schools.

407C529B717A40AF984C43E6A39313DB.description:
I can explain through comparisons between products and practices to help me
understand perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

09ED3539B03646B39D6FF7C8F3344B7A.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can explain through comparisons between products and
practices to help me understand perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

D668A41DB3F743CE87918E81353BF929.description:
I can connect and discuss historical and contemporary phenomena of my heritage
language and culture with my peers, school community, heritage community and family.

4663E565380A4B158177273B721BCA11.description:
I can identify and compare the different historical and contemporary heritage
backgrounds among my heritage classmates.

9E4060B4F1BE404DA5F526D0050E5967.description:
I can research, identify and describe significant historical phenomena that are
unique to my heritage culture.

A0FBA85279304D969FF4C49B852DC310.description:
I can identify and describe significant contemporary experiences that are unique to
my heritage culture.

7063C49D59BB4DCC85100F8449427DC4.description:
I can identify and describe the different traditions in comparison with my own
heritage experiences.

BF3BCF3C74EB449CA08F619D1575A743.description:
I can identify and describe the perspectives of different traditions within families,
communities, and schools.

33BAD51EEBA04F789278CB84D24A203F.description:
I can investigate products and practices to help me understand perspectives in the
target cultures and in my own.

E3B187EB78EF49C4841F6B890CF741F4.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Novice - I can investigate products and practices to help me understand
perspectives in the target cultures and in my own.

6C6FACC2081F42A5875695E1B71F7A4E.description:
Relating Cultural Practices and Products to Perspectives (Investigate)-
Learners use language to investigate, explain, and reflect on the relationship between the practices and
products to perspectives of the target cultures.

56682F87E97E480DBF97F0279A49F030.description:
I can analyze and explain in writing the influences of heritage language usage
manifested in communications in my community.

BE5CBA2B283A481A9E3ED91F2F05DCEE.description: I can examine how these interrelations shape my cultural identity.

DB1B8D1D2CA0415C94D97C08FA96F93B.description:
I can evaluate the interrelationships among the practices, products, and
perspectives of my heritage culture and those of the predominant culture.

8150FA86D16B49C08A350D9851C15FCE.description:
I can examine in writing the influence of heritage language usage manifested in
communications in my community.

977853B8FAF64715A9A865B0F467BDE8.description: I can analyze how these interrelations shape my cultural identity.

46BE89D5F8184BE1AC3EFAFC1130F29A.description:
I can identify the interrelationships among the practices, products, and
perspectives of my heritage culture in relation to the predominant culture.

1B90173C2B374A63ADAE6296822A30F7.description:
I can recognize in writing the influences of heritage language usage manifested in
communications in my community.

7FC2C027FD294FE0BB01FAF032BE260A.description: I can recognize how these interrelations shape my cultural identity.

D091040586C1434B9CC7C5CD0020EE23.description:
I can identify the interrelationships among the practices, products, and
perspectives of my heritage culture and those of the predominant culture.

1F1B13C573D849658D44D96FD474851A.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: I can understand my heritage culture through comparisons made between
practices, products, and perspectives of my heritage culture and those of the predominant culture.

72ABAE00C8CF424A8E887368376D03C6.description:
Relating to Other Cultures by Interacting - Learners use language to interact
with others in and from another culture.

3FEA8FA108844C65BDCAE8E143478117.description: Interact with cultural competence and understanding.

812C341A7EDE4D48A6FE2CDC78AB9357.description:
I can use and integrate citations, anecdotes, quotes, and details and explain how
they support the message and purpose of written communications with facilitation.

8A7E530BBBB44E43B8F0593B22F92C2C.description:
I can use specialized vocabulary and consistent verb tenses to evaluate enduring
contemporary topics in the heritage language with facilitation using connected paragraphs.

6D709D1DA05B434F97854FBCA3E478A0.description:
I can present information about enduring contemporary topics related to the
heritage language.

C69A5A59884E4A4C8935C9A8AA82FE6F.description:
I can use/integrate citations, anecdotes, quotes, and details to support the
message and purpose of written communications with some guidance.

1DD21286FEF54C38B19B3FEDF59A8ADD.description:
I can use appropriate grammatical agreement and register as well as idiomatic,
colloquial, and proverbial expressions independently in the heritage language.

695780A3EB934B0D80B6AB01389C8C7D.description:
I can present information about my life, activities, and enduring contemporary
topics using original, simple sentences in my heritage language.

2B552EC019E143808B74A24C218D2612.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can communicate information, make presentations, and
express my thoughts about enduring contemporary topics using paragraphs and a series of connected
paragraphs through spoken and written heritage language supported by visuals and gestures.

B6D1705BFD6043A2AFD643F8A74B81DB.description:
I can identify citations, anecdotes, quotes, and details to support the message
and purpose of written communications with guidance.

E45CC5FFE0524CEAB37A94BAD7BA489D.description:
I can use appropriate grammatical agreement and register as well as idiomatic,
colloquial, and proverbial expressions in the heritage language with guidance.

B169A68A548B46D598CD8034C14541E7.description:
I can present information about myself and familiar topics using original simple
sentences in my heritage language.

D9BB8988E39F44EA8F67EAD6E99E34C7.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Novice - I can communicate and present information on familiar, personal, and
everyday topics using simple sentences as well as idiomatic, colloquial, and proverbial expressions
through spoken or written heritage language supported by visuals and gestures.

15C8CFE30D5D4FE0BFCF2F1D9A53C253.description:
Presentational: Learners present information, concepts, and ideas to inform,
explain, persuade, and narrate on a variety of topics using appropriate resources and adapting to various
audiences of listeners, readers, or viewers.

7B21876E340E42BD9E2989AF5AEDC32D.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can evaluate non-verbal cues that enhance
understanding of oral communication.

815D9601D0584063B05A89B59BDC7B97.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can synthesize oral communications on
various enduring contemporary topics.

397E814E84674137AEC320FD6E827257.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can examine and analyze word families,
cognates, borrowed and shared words, and synonyms and antonyms to expand vocabulary
and derive meaning.

4ADD995543004E4B992566708641DA23.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can analyze the use of idiomatic, colloquial,
and proverbial expressions as well as register.

368DDB44A52047F6986DD6C3D014CA26.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can examine non-verbal cues that enhance
understanding of oral communication.

8EAF3AA7297549D49C39DA21E04441E5.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can understand and sometimes analyze oral
communication with little guidance.

C6033182BDDE4CF1B5AB48C5B5D2AF03.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can group word families, cognates, borrowed
and shared words to expand vocabulary and derive meaning.

C287804C63C84BA7A738403600E7F659.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can usually understand and examine the use
of idiomatic, colloquial and proverbial expressions as well as register.

77E7CBC4A17B46D0A2C9DA2D9981BD12.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can recognize non-verbal cues that enhance
understanding of oral communication.

4FEA04A9C38340DB90DE6DD5DCE81CB0.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can interpret oral communication with
guidance.

89E23DE057CC4D3B86200DC7AA119F6F.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can recognize word families, cognates, and
borrowed and shared words to expand vocabulary and derive meaning.

324745339BC146B4A5D01339C66399EF.description:
In conversations and discussions, I can recognize the use of idiomatic, colloquial,
and proverbial expressions as well as register.

A149142A5D89472FBBCF500E72CF5658.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can understand the main idea and various pieces of
information on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences in spoken or gestured
contexts in my heritage language.

E55DEAF05FE94EBC8C0F31710C36DEF7.description:
- I can analyze and examine some practices, products, and perspectives of the
heritage cultures (ex. geography, history, religion, fine arts, etc.).

FAB55E423C334AFBB25510A5EDEB745B.description: I can examine and analyze similes, metaphors, imagery, and other literary devices.

968970D681D9476DA757B62AB4214740.description:
I can evaluate arguments, point of view, or purpose for both fiction and nonfiction
texts in the heritage language.

88414DC02768419992BE7850A7DFF63F.description:
I can analyze and examine the main idea and supporting points of a text related to
enduring contemporary topics in the heritage language.

DBC7662EBDB24495BD36FC5D4D76C435.description:
I can interpret specialized vocabulary, appropriate register, and genre specific
conventions in texts related to enduring contemporary topics in the heritage language.

713EFB532E10450A9FA31B46104C6A5C.description:
I can understand some practices, products, and perspectives of the heritage
cultures (ex. geography, history, religion, fine arts, etc.).

2D3381B651714837A453C8DA805EFF9D.description:
I can interpret literal and figurative language in fiction and determine figurative
connotation of words in context.

8FF4FC80984E44378884D27DDB8CF9EE.description:
I can understand messages from friends and some information from news media
when the topic is familiar in my heritage language.

9B285AE4EAFC4A48ADFE67AE2D3A1694.description:
I can understand some additional topics related to the main idea of short and
simple texts when the topic is familiar in my heritage language.

666110B619B940BC935806CF06B8383E.description:
I can demonstrate the main idea of short and simple texts when the topic is familiar
and in my heritage language.

1FCCFC895D1E4B919EDE86F622645BA4.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can understand the main idea and various pieces of
information on familiar topics from sentences and series of connected sentences in spoken and/or
written contexts in my heritage language.

C8B5973F264B4258A182ECA010EF6E9C.description:
I can identify some practices, products, and perspectives of my heritage culture
when I read in my heritage language.

480E9B1A14D14E05BDBC0B43F706CCA7.description: I can recognize similes, metaphors, imagery, and other literary devices.

FC6CD8B0A325493588E8A96F4E3ABCDB.description:
I can identify some supporting topics related to the main topic when I read in my
heritage language.

2511508AE06E46BFBD973FE4B1A23363.description:
I can identify main ideas in fiction and non-fiction as well as identify the structural
elements of text and its purpose when I engage with my heritage language.

CC4514332E1E460BBCD4AA192DB4BAAA.description:
I can identify and recognize some learned or memorized words and phrases when
I read in my heritage language.

BE75B5E916EB450DA7435C9EEC3E02EF.description:
I can identify and recognize some words and phrases in both very familiar and
everyday contexts read in my heritage language.

6F96892A26964A2E99B6EACA58BE4EB4.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Novice - I can identify the general topic and some basic information in both
very familiar and everyday contexts by recognizing practiced or memorized words, phrases, and simple
sentences in spoken and/or written contexts in my heritage language.

C4DDDEC62C0044B6B2A6D081F1491644.description:
Interpretive: Learners understand, interpret, and analyze what is heard, read, or
viewed on a variety of topics.

D67A8839F3C54B2480A78172E289869A.description:
I can employ idiomatic, colloquial, and proverbial expressions as well as register
independently to enhance comprehension.

E5D9CD498BC041C18B8E4EAC56718302.description:
I can discuss and exchange opinions in spoken, written, and gestured conversations in my
heritage language on enduring contemporary topics I have researched using connected sentences that
may combine to form paragraphs and ask a variety of questions, often across various time frames.

4C57F4CEB7C04F208880C4B7FD2CCCB0.description:
I can employ idiomatic, colloquial, and proverbial expressions as well as register with some
guidance to enhance comprehension.

06DFC33453224F01BD8D2EC07FE84909.description:
I can identify and exchange information in spoken and written conversations on a variety of
familiar and researched topics including heritage topics, while using words, phrases and connected
sentences through my heritage language.

939A1F1E350F4085BE06E3BDD13C9730.description:
I can employ idiomatic, colloquial, and proverbial expressions as well as register with
guidance to enhance comprehension.

3A06FBE1A3C04D06980B14FD64695397.description:
I can participate in spontaneous spoken, written, or gestured conversations on familiar topics,
creating sentences and series of sentences to ask and answer a variety of questions using my heritage
language.

AD164A15EAAE4162B79F1FC895C7E103.description:
Proficiency Benchmark: Intermediate - I can participate in spontaneous spoken, written, or
gestured conversations on familiar topics, creating sentences and series of sentences to ask and
answer a variety of questions.

179C6CA36DA94FC692F411668DCBBC50.description:
Interpersonal: Learners interact and negotiate meaning in spoken, signed, or
written conversations to share information, reactions, feelings, and opinions.

A4829FA31EF94FB088203E82EC392588.description:
Communicate effectively in more than one language in order to function in a
variety of situations and for multiple purposes.
